page.title: 19TRANSPORT SURVEY:MILLER WAY
page.content: {TRANSPORT SURVEY.} 280 people interviewed.211 had cars,93 motorbikes,49 bicycles.Car owners:red and blue most popular colour,car age:5-10 yrs.Av.mileage per wk:50-100 miles.Main purpose:work.110 people never been on a plane.Long distance coach most popular way of travel:quick +cheap.Public transport used for,shopping+work. {MILLER WAY:}4.8km.Crownhill roundabout to Novorossisk Rd.serves:3 hospitals, 3 schools,Military base,Industrial Estate,Asda Superstore,Plymouth Airport,a college & large area of housing south of the road.One subway planned for Asda,Estover C.P.School shares.1984 Thornbury Primary School Parents,after several accidents formed protest group.Rd.blocked several times,protest stopped when action promised.Nothing yet(July 1985)
